alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 3:21PM CDT until August 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 321 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Thomastown to Dowdville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Prospect, Dowdville, Tuscola, Madden, Dixon, Walnut Grove, Sebastopol, Lena, Redwater and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
